product_name: Platypus Sprint XT 35 Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: From day hikes to ultralight backpacking, the Platypus Sprint XT 35 Hydration Pack covers it all with a 3-liter hydration reservoir and a top-loading design that makes the most of every inch of space. 3.0L Big Zip SL reservoir in an independent hydration pocket features multiple hose-routing options, a low-profile shape and a wide-mouth opening that locks securely. Ventilated, padded shoulder straps, hipbelt and back panel create a breathable and comfortable suspension. Single aluminum stay runs down the removable framesheet for weight transfer and control with heavier loads. Weatherproof construction features taped seams, waterproof coated fabric and water resistant zippers that stand up to heavy precipitation and rugged use. Stashable accessory straps make it easy to carry your helmet, ice axe or trekking poles. The Platypus Sprint XT 35 Hydration Pack features zippered top-load access, hipbelt pockets, mesh side pockets and an expanding mesh front pocket.
short_description: From day hikes to ultralight backpacking, the Platypus Sprint XT 35 Hydration Pack covers it all with a 3-liter hydration reservoir and a top-loading design that makes the most of every inch of space.
